level.heading: Charges in bad faith.
level.text: A lender shall not charge and retain fees paid by the borrower in making a covered loan which are:
For services that are not actually performed;
For loan discount points which are not bona fide discount points; or
In violation of the Real Estate Procedures Settlement Act of 1974, approved December 22, 1974 (88 Stat. 1724; 12 U.S.C. ยง 2601 et seq.).
